Title: Authorizes funding that would include services and expenses intended to result in improved compliance with fair housing laws
Summary: Authorizes funding that would include services and expenses intended to result in improved compliance with fair housing laws such as intake and assessment of cases in which fair housing rights may have been violated and enforcement action.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 53 of the laws of 2024, enacting the aid to localities budget, in relation to authorizing funding that would include services and expenses intended to result in improved compliance with fair housing laws
